snippet: Ten environmental advocacy groups filed suit in federal court in Alaska to try to force Shell and the Interior Department to take additional steps to protect the Arctic Ocean from oil spills.
abstract: Ten environmental advocacy groups file suit in federal court to try to force Shell and the Interior Department to take additional steps to protect the Arctic Ocean off the North Slope of Alaska from oil spills; Shell is scheduled to drill exploratory wells in the region.
lead_paragraph: Ten environmental advocacy groups filed suit in federal court in Alaska to try to force Shell and the Interior Department to take additional steps to protect the Arctic Ocean from oil spills.

headline.main: Alaska: Groups Sue Over Drilling in Arctic Ocean
headline.print_headline: Alaska: Groups Sue Over Drilling In Arctic Ocean
